title: PM Narendra Modi greets Telangana on Statehood day
article_body: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister greeted the people of on their today. "On their Statehood Day, my best wishes to the people of Telangana. May the dreams and aspirations of the people of the state be fulfilled in the years to come," Modi tweeted.   Telangana is celebrating its fourth year of formation. It became the country's 29th state on June 2, 2014, after it was carved out of . Modi also expressed his wishes for the people of Andhra Pradesh. "Greetings to my sisters and brothers of Andhra Pradesh. I pray for the good health and prosperity of the people of the state," the Prime Minister said in another tweet.
description: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister greeted the people of on their today. "On their Statehood Day, my best wishes to the people of Telangana. May the dreams and aspirations of the people of the state be fulfilled in the years to come," Modi tweeted.
